name: MimiCorps
description:
MimiCorps is a 4 vs 1 online multiplayer hide, seek & catch game.

A hunter team has to support each other to find and catch the monster by using traps and paralyser guns while the monster has to hide, collect radioactive containers and plant spores to infest the secret base.
